name: Hudson Rouge
tagline: Advertising Agency in New York, New York
description:
Headquartered in New York City with offices in Detroit, Shanghai, and Toronto, Hudson Rouge is an award-winning, multidisciplinary creative agency specializing in luxury brands. Hudson Rouge was conceived to re-imagine and completely re-launch one of America’s oldest and most storied brands — The Lincoln Motor Company.
In just four years of business, Hudson Rouge has already garnered a number of top industry awards and accolades, including Clio, Webbys, AICP, IAB and three highly coveted Cannes Lions.
